metadata.name: ONE.1
metadata.description:
Collection one is a series of biomimetic generative still images that replicate the familiar patterns of nature. This series was largely inspired by the iridescent colours of the mother of pearl shell and explores the interrelationship between humans, technology, the world around us and natures effect on the human nervous system.

This high resolution NFT is 1/3 unique artworks in the first collection by Tom Bolitho.

3000x3000 
JPEG
TIFF
